app/(app)/(modals)/forms/questionsForm.t.english: Do you want to answer these questions later?

app/(app)/(modals)/subscriptionManagemen.english: You have already cancelled your subscription.

app/(app)/(modals)/subscriptionManagemen.text: Seguirá activa hasta que finalice tu período de pago.
app/(app)/(modals)/subscriptionManagemen.english: It will remain active until your payment period ends.

app/(app)/(modals)/subscriptionManagemen.text: Error al cargar datos del usuario
No hay datos de membresía disponibles
No se pudo procesar la cancelación. Verifica tu conexión a internet.
app/(app)/(modals)/subscriptionManagemen.english: Could not process cancellation. Check your internet connection.

app/(app)/(modals)/subscriptionManagemen.text: Tu suscripción ha sido cancelada exitosamente. Podrás seguir usando la app hasta el final del período actual.
app/(app)/(modals)/subscriptionManagemen.english: Your subscription has been successfully cancelled. You can continue using the app until the end of the current period.

app/(app)/(modals)/subscriptionManagemen.text: No se pudo cancelar la suscripción. Por favor, intenta nuevamente.
app/(app)/(modals)/subscriptionManagemen.english: Could not cancel subscription. Please try again.

app/(app)/(tabs)/(audios)/_layout.tsx.text: Por si tienes un vuelo, o no pagaste el wifi.
app/(app)/(tabs)/(audios)/_layout.tsx.english: In case you have a flight, or didn't pay for wifi.

app/(app)/(tabs)/(audios)/index.tsx.english: You don't have any hypnosis downloaded

app/(app)/(tabs)/(audios)/index.tsx.text:
No es culpa del universo. Es que no te has conectado a internet.

Conéctate y descarga tus hipnosis para escucharlas en el avión o en la Luna.
app/(app)/(tabs)/(audios)/index.tsx.english:
It's not the universe's fault. You just haven't connected to the internet.

Connect and download your hypnosis to listen to them on the plane or on the Moon.

app/(app)/(tabs)/(audios)/index.tsx.text:
Cada vez que pidas una, a los 15 días te 
habilitaré para que puedas pedirme tu 
siguiente hipnosis.
app/(app)/(tabs)/(audios)/index.tsx.english:
Every time you request one, in 15 days I'll 
enable you to request your 
next hypnosis from me.

app/(app)/(tabs)/(audios)/index.tsx.text: Es broma, algo falló en el sistema. Intenta de nuevo.
app/(app)/(tabs)/(audios)/index.tsx.english: Just kidding, something failed in the system. Try again.

app/(app)/(tabs)/(audios)/index.tsx.text: Sí, ya sé… tienes que escribir todo otra vez. Pero si pasó, es por algo. Confía.
app/(app)/(tabs)/(audios)/index.tsx.english: Yes, I know... you have to write everything again. But if it happened, it's for a reason. Trust.

app/(app)/(tabs)/chat/index.tsx.text: Checa el estado de tu cuenta para acceder al Psilócogo
app/(app)/(tabs)/chat/index.tsx.english: Check your account status to access the Psilócogo

app/(app)/profile.tsx.text: No se pudo abrir la aplicación de correo. Por favor, envíame un correo a apoyo@mental.app con el asunto: Contacto desde la aplicación
app/(app)/profile.tsx.english: Could not open the email application. Please send me an email to apoyo@mental.app with the subject: Contact from the application

app/(app)/profile.tsx.text: Error al abrir la aplicación de correo: Error:
app/(app)/profile.tsx.english: Error opening the email application: Error:

tres

what you answer is what

app/(auth)/loginView.tsx.english:
You already have an account,
sign in

app/(auth)/loginView.tsx.text: Este correo no está registrado. Verifica que esté correcto o crea una cuenta nueva.
app/(auth)/loginView.tsx.english: This email is not registered. Please verify it's correct or create a new account.

app/(auth)/loginView.tsx.text: O yo soy muy tonto o este correo no está registrado en mi lista de usuarios.
app/(auth)/loginView.tsx.english: Either I'm very stupid or this email is not registered in my user list.

helpers/miscellaneous.ts.text: Este correo ya está registrado, inicia sesión.
helpers/miscellaneous.ts.english: This email is already registered, please sign in.

app/(auth)/verification.tsx.text: Ingresa el código que llegó a tu correo
app/(auth)/verification.tsx.english: Enter the code that arrived in your email

app/(auth)/verification.tsx.text: Tiene cuatro dígitos. Y una duración de 555 segundos. (No hagas la cuenta, te sobra tiempo)
app/(auth)/verification.tsx.english: It has four digits. And a duration of 555 seconds. (Don't do the math, you have plenty of time)

app/(auth)/verification.tsx.text: Error al verificar el código, inténtelo nuevamente.
app/(auth)/verification.tsx.english: Error verifying code, please try again.

app/(auth)/verification.tsx.text: No era probable, pero te equivocaste, o pasaron más de 555 segundos, checa de nuevo.
app/(auth)/verification.tsx.english: It wasn't likely, but you were wrong, or more than 555 seconds passed, check again.

app/(auth)/verification.tsx.text:
Ingresa el código
que llegó a tu correo
app/(auth)/verification.tsx.english:
Enter the code
that arrived in your email

app/(auth)/verification.tsx.text:
Tiene cuatro dígitos. 
Y una duración de 555 segundos.
(No hagas la cuenta, te sobra tiempo)
app/(auth)/verification.tsx.english:
It has four digits. 
And a duration of 555 seconds.
(Don't do the math, you have plenty of time)

app/(auth)/unavailableRegistration.tsx.text: Si quieres probar, déjame tu correo y te aviso cuando pueda.
app/(auth)/unavailableRegistration.tsx.english: If you want to try, leave me your email and I'll let you know when I can.

components/CaptureBlockerModal.tsx.text: El contenido está diseñado para vivirse, no para compartirse.
components/CaptureBlockerModal.tsx.english: The content is designed to be experienced, not shared.

components/CaptureBlockerModal.tsx.text: Prefiero que no grabes. Seguro lo entiendes.
components/CaptureBlockerModal.tsx.english: I prefer you don't record. I'm sure you understand.

components/ChatRefactor.tsx.english: Last night I dreamed something very strange
I don't know what's wrong with me
I don't know what I want
What do I do if I'm sad?

components/ChatRefactor.tsx.text: Siento que algo va a pasar
components/ChatRefactor.tsx.english: I feel like something is going to happen
I think I saw a sign

components/ChatRefactor.tsx.text: Mi cuerpo sabe algo que yo no
components/ChatRefactor.tsx.english: My body knows something I don't
Why do I feel weird today?

components/ChatWelcomeScreen.tsx.text: Como tu psicólogo, pero más loco. . .

components/FormInput.tsx.english: Are you sure you're that young?

components/FormWizard.tsx.text: Es broma, algo falló en el sistema. Intenta de nuevo.
components/FormWizard.tsx.english: Just kidding, something failed in the system. Try again.

components/FormWizard.tsx.text: Sí, ya sé… tienes que escribir todo otra vez. Pero si pasó, es por algo. Confía.
components/FormWizard.tsx.english: Yes, I know... you have to write everything again. But if it happened, it's for a reason. Trust.

components/FormWizardOnBoarding.tsx.english: Do you want to answer these questions later?
What do you want me to call you?

components/FormWizardOnBoarding.tsx.text: Escríbelo como se lee, y si tiene algún acento raro, márcalo. (Que no es lo mismo Julián, que Julian o Yulian)
components/FormWizardOnBoarding.tsx.english: Write it as it's read, and if it has a strange accent, mark it. (It's not the same Julián as Julian or Yulian)

components/FormWizardOnBoarding.tsx.text: Estas son las respuestas que quieres enviar, ¿cierto?
components/FormWizardOnBoarding.tsx.english: These are the answers you want to send, right?

components/FormWizardOnBoarding.tsx.text: Una vez enviadas, no podrás cambiarlas.
components/FormWizardOnBoarding.tsx.english: Once sent, you won't be able to change them.

components/FormWizardOnBoarding.tsx.text: No pudimos verificar tu correo electrónico debido a un problema de conexión. Verifica tu conexión a internet e intenta nuevamente.
components/FormWizardOnBoarding.tsx.english: We couldn't verify your email due to a connection problem. Check your internet connection and try again.

components/SubscriptionCancelModal.tsx.text: Y para escuchar las anteriores, tendrás que renovar tu suscripción.
